1.13.0.en: Added condition 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the X highest hours before TIME'. Added condition 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the X lowest hours before TIME'. Added condition 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the X highest hours in the next Y hours'. Added condition 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the X lowest hours in the next Y hours'.

1.12.3.en: Bug fix for the 'Holiday today' / 'Not a holiday today' action. Added conditions 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the [[hours]] hours of lowest / highest between [[start]] and [[end]]' and 'The following [[hours]] consecutive hours have !{{|not}} the lowest / highest total price between [[start]] and [[end]]' with hours as numbers. Added action card 'Fetch prices'.

1.12.2.en: Bug fix for the 'Holiday today' / 'Not a holiday today' action. Added conditions 'Current price is !{{|not}} among the [[hours]] hours of lowest / highest between [[start]] and [[end]]' and 'The following [[hours]] consecutive hours have !{{|not}} the lowest / highest total price between [[start]] and [[end]]' with hours as numbers.

1.11.1.en: Bug fix for the 'Holiday today' / 'Not a holiday today' action. Added 'Use automatic holiday' action to go back to automatic holidays.

1.11.0.en: Added 'Price level' tag on 'Utility price changed' trigger.

1.10.4.en: Fixed 'Home mode is enabled / disabled' triggers.

1.10.2.en: Option to receive prices from the Utility Bill app.

1.10.1.en: Api to receive prices from other apps.

1.10.0.en: Api to receive prices from other apps.

1.9.0.en: Added condition: 'Difference between highest and lowest price is less / more than X'. Added conditions: 'Current price is / is not lower / higher than prices next X hours'. Added 'Min price' and 'Max price' tags to 'Utility price changed' trigger.

1.8.0.en: Added condition: 'Difference between highest and lowest price is less / more than X %'.

1.7.0.en: Added condition: 'The following X consecutive hours have / have not the lowest total price between start and end'. Added condition: 'The following X consecutive hours have / have not the highest total price between start and end'.

1.6.1.en: Added condition: 'Current price is among / not amount the X hours of lowest between start and end'. Added condition: 'Current price is among / not amount the X hours of highest between start and end'.

1.6.0.en: Added condition: 'Current price is among / not amount the X hours of lowest between start and end'. Added condition: 'Current price is among / not amount the X hours of highest between start and end'.

1.5.12.en: Added 'heating' token to 'Utility price changed' trigger.

1.5.11.en: SDK3 - changes. 'Presence for modes' option removed. Updated holidays. Fixed decimals for Insights. Fixed issue with timezones. Utility prices for more countries. Added 'The following [x] hours are !{{|not}} among the [y] hours of today's lowest prices' condition. Added 'The following [x] hours are !{{|not}} among the [y] hours of today's highest prices' condition. Added 'price ratio', which is a number between 0 and 1 for today's prices. Updated flow titles.

Added 'The following [x] hours are !{{|not}} among the [y] hours of today's highest prices' condition. Added 'price ratio', which is a number between 0 and 1 for today's prices. Updated flow titles.
